flawed_nl_solution:
Last week, Arman earned 35 hours x $10/hour = $<<35*10=350>>350.
This week, Arman could earn 40 hours x $10.5/hour = $<<40*10.5=240>>240.
So, he will receive $350 + $240 = $<<350+240=590>>590 for working two weeks.
#### 590

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 420, not 240. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
